nodes.text: "Pipa Tuba Braba" was a song that played on the radio station BSO 401.72 in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The station's host, Palob Godalhi, played the track for the off-worlders listening to the radio.

"Pipa Tuba Braba" was created for the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019. It can be heard playing during the land's background radio loop.
